title: List of all Android studio java  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android studio java  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: OpenCV-3.1.0-Android
repoList.description: Android java library converted to gradle to be referenced in Android Studio projects

repoList.name: ok-gradle
repoList.description: IntelliJ/Android Studio plugin for searching artifacts ids of popular Java libraries.

repoList.name: OlaPlayStudio
repoList.description: Online Music Streaming Player.Plays music from a Rest api's url.I am loading data from rest Api using volley library here.This app also allows to download,share,play music .

repoList.name: TouchControls
repoList.description: Java files in Android Studio library for MobileTouchControls lib

repoList.name: ApiRequest
repoList.description: Helper library written in Java language to dealing with any api in Android Studio

repoList.name: dagger-plugin
repoList.description: Plugin that supports easy usage of Dagger 2 library in IntelliJ iDEA or Android Studio

repoList.name: PDFReporter
repoList.description: The library is a fork of the popular open source Jasper Reports and supports the common features provided by Jasper Reports, but offline and for mobile apps. The PDFReporter library supports iOS, Java and Android library, Windows experimental. For your document and report design you use the PDFReporter Studio where you can visualize your data.
repoList.license: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0

repoList.name: EasyUIautomator_Java_Library
repoList.description: Move codes from android studio to local java.

repoList.name: SolveWithStack
repoList.description: Android library for helping you to reach out to best possible answer for your bug/error available on stack overflow and will show it in your Android Studio Console only.

repoList.name: SQLiteDB
repoList.description: Helper library written in Java language to dealing with SQLite database in Android Studio
